title: A Japanese Rival to Rolls-Royce: Toyota Launches the Century Brand
description: Nearly four decades after making a big push into the luxury market with the launch of the Lexus brand, Toyota Motor Corp. is setting its sites even higher. descriptionSummary: Toyota has set its sights on a new pinnacle in luxury with the unveiling of the enigmatic Century Coupe Concept, marking another bold step in the company's four-decade journey to redefine high-end automotive excellence.

title: Mazda Reveals A Stunning Rotary-Powered Concept - And A Futuristic Mazda2 That Talks
description: At the 2025 Japan Mobility Show, Mazda has presented two very different but equally interesting concepts that will (hopefully) inform future models. descriptionSummary: At this year's Japan Mobility Show, Mazda unveiled two concept vehicles that showcase innovative approaches to sustainable driving and cutting-edge technology, hinting at a promising future for the brand's automotive evolution.

title: Is the LS Coupe Concept the New Lexus Flagship?
description: The Lexus LS was the sedan that showed the world Japan could truly compete with the best European luxury brands. But after a 36-year run, the LS is about to drive off into the sunset, the victim of declining demand for highline sedans. The automaker will give the LS one last hurrah with the ...

descriptionSummary: After a three-decade reign as Japan's premier luxury sedan, the Lexus LS is poised to bow out, succumbing to waning interest in high-end sedans. Its final swan song comes in the form of an anticipated farewell model.

title: Porsche GT3 RS For Sale With 132 Miles and Weissach Package Looks Like a Steal
description: Porsche’s latest 992-generation GT3 RS isn’t easy to get your hands on, even if you have enough cash in hand. Yet, one lucky buyer managed to do just that. descriptionSummary: A rare 992-generation Porsche 911 GT3 RS in sleek Ice Gray Metallic has appeared for sale just months after being purchased. This pristine example spent minimal time on the road, and is now up for grabs.

title: Kia Bets on Military Muscle to Save Its New Pickup
titleSummary: "Kia Rolls Out Beefed-Up Defender to Rev Up Struggling Pickup Sales"
descriptionSummary: Kia's latest iteration of the Tasman pickup boasts exceptional ruggedness, engineered specifically to withstand the most unforgiving off-road environments, serving as a reliable workhorse for military and emergency response applications.

description: It really says something about the confidence GM has in the 1,000+ horsepower Corvette ZR1 and ZR1X that they put these supercar-slayers in the hands of its own engineers, not pro racecar drivers, when it came time to set lap records tumbling at the Nürburgring. The ZR1’s twin-turbo 5.5-liter V8 is ...

title: From Beetle to Buzz: How Volkswagen Won America Over
description: Back in 1949, a Dutch businessman named Ben Pon rolled into New York with two little cars from Germany called the Volkswagen Type 1. descriptionSummary: In 1949, Dutch entrepreneur Ben Pon arrived in New York with a pair of quirky German cars, the Volkswagen Beetle, marking the beginning of a lasting partnership between Volkswagen and America.

title: Alfa Romeo 4C For Sale With 10,810 Miles: Alfa’s Carbon Fiber Baby Supercar Costs Less Than a New Camry

title: Ford and Google Just Charted America's Wildest Off-Road Trail
description: The TransAmerica Trail (TAT) is not your typical off-road trail. It's a 5,900-mile stretch of mostly unpaved paths that link the Pacific coast of Oregon to the Atlantic coast of North Carolina. There are no official signs, no tourist stops, and no highway traffic – just a network of dirt, gravel, ...
titleSummary: "Ford and Google Map Out the Ultimate American Adventure Off the Beaten Path"
descriptionSummary: The TransAmerica Trail is an epic off-pavement adventure spanning 5,900 miles from Oregon's Pacific coast to North Carolina's Atlantic shore, weaving through a vast network of rugged dirt roads, gravel paths, and serene countryside.

title: Hyundai Drops Exciting 2026 Kona Lease Deals for October

descriptionSummary: Hyundai's feisty subcompact crossover has matured without sacrificing its spunk. The 2026 Kona boasts refreshed design and cutting-edge tech, now available for an astonishing lease price that puts used cars to shame, starting at just $149 per month.

descriptionSummary: The Italian police force has welcomed two high-performance vehicles into their ranks, a Maserati MCPURA and an Alfa Romeo Giulia Quadrifoglio. These sleek cars will transport critical medical supplies, including organs and blood, across the country with utmost urgency.

title: Sleeping Tesla Driver Blames Autopilot After Rear-Ending Police Car

title: Why Your Car Insurance Keeps Rising — Even If You Drive an Old Truck
description: Insurance feels fair until you’re paying for tech your car doesn’t even have. Even if you drive a 2014 pickup with none of ...
titleSummary: "Rising Premiums Leave Many Drivers Wondering What's Behind the Growing Costs"
descriptionSummary: The illusion of fairness is shattered when insurance premiums skyrocket due to advanced safety features on newer vehicles, making even small accidents costly repairs for drivers of older cars without these technologies.

title: Toyota 4Runner and Grand Highlander Miss IIHS Top Safety Awards

descriptionSummary: Stellantis' Hurricane engine made its debut as a potent twin-turbo inline-six in 2021, initially featured in flagship models like the Jeep Grand Wagoneer and Ram 1500. It offers a rare balance of V8-like power and respectable efficiency. With this promising start, the brand is poised to further refine the design.

title: 2026 Jeep Grand Cherokee Revealed With New Turbo Engine and Refined Design

title: Massive Ram ProMaster Recall For Fire Risk Could Impact Fleets Nationwide
description: Chrysler’s Ram division is recalling nearly 292,000 ProMaster vans built between 2018 and 2026 due to a potential fire hazard linked to the cooling fan module, according to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA). A malfunctioning cooling fan module poses a fire risk, prompting an investigation by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration. Affected vehicles are primarily those used in commercial fleets.

title: Toyota's New Infotainment System Aims To Set A New Standard
description: The 2026 Toyota RAV4 marks the beginning of a new generation for the model and the debut of the enhanced Toyota audio multimedia system. titleSummary: "Revamping the Ride: Toyota Unveils Advanced In-Car Tech for a Smooth Journey"
descriptionSummary: The 2026 RAV4 kicks off a fresh chapter for the beloved model, introducing an upgraded audio and multimedia experience that sets a new benchmark for in-car entertainment.

title: New Study Says Plug-In Hybrids Are Much Dirtier Than Claimed

descriptionSummary: A new analysis of 800,000 vehicles in everyday use across Europe reveals that plug-in hybrid cars emit nearly five times more carbon dioxide than initially thought, challenging their touted eco-friendliness.

title: The $3,000 Rule: When to Keep Your Car and When to Trade
description: Trade-ins hit 7.6 years on average in Q1 2025, the oldest since 2019. At the same time, the average vehicle age on U.S. roads is 12.8 years. That gap says plenty: people keep cars longer, but when they do trade, they’re arriving later in the life cycle. If you’re searching “should I keep my old ...
titleSummary: "Break Even or Break Free: The $3,000 Milestone for Keeping or Trading Your Ride"
descriptionSummary: As of Q1 2025, traded-in vehicles were an average 7.6 years old, a six-year high since 2019. Meanwhile, the typical car on American roads has reached 12.8 years. This disparity reveals a trend: drivers hang onto their vehicles longer, but tend to replace them at a more advanced age.

title: The FBI Says Illegal Chinese Airbags Have Been Killing Even More Americans Than Initially Thought
description: There's another big airbag scandal going on, and this time, it has nothing to do with Takata. descriptionSummary: A new airbag safety crisis is unfolding, one that doesn't involve Takata. Federal authorities are probing a wave of counterfeit, imported airbags from China, linked to fatal accidents and alarming safety concerns.

title: Nissan’s New EV Battery Promises Double the Range and Faster Charging

descriptionSummary: Tucked away within Mitsubishi's Okazaki Plant lies an exclusive museum, the Mitsubishi Auto Gallery, accessible only to select guests by invitation. This rarefied space offers an extraordinary experience for those fortunate enough to enter.

descriptionSummary: Rumors of a Chevrolet Camaro revival remain speculative, but for now, enthusiasts must look to the used market to experience the thrill of driving this iconic American muscle car.
